summary: Adds a unique Iron Short Sword to the game. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.
descriptionHtml:
What is this mod?

Adds a unique Iron Short Sword to the game. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.

Craft at any forge under Iron. Temper, enchant, Enjoy :)

======================================================================================

Lighter, faster iron sword with same base stats as steel. Slightly reduced reach.

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help shortsword 4

Player.additem XX 000D62 1

in the console.

====================================================================================

[youtube]FhOqzF8FZao[/youtube] [youtube]UkZEKTHyOP4[/youtube]

[youtube]jtJtsF79PjU[/youtube] [youtube]k2wZWJ1Q00o[/youtube]

Huge thanks to dptheslothking, Slytra, Ruiji and hodilton for the showcases. Really appreciate it guys :)

Please stop by there channels on Youtube and support when you can.

====================================================================================
INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM.

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don't forget to activate the .esp ;)

====================================================================================
author: KettleWitch
